level.heading: Effective date.
level.text: This chapter shall take effect after a 30-day period of Congressional review following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council of the District of Columbia to override the veto) as provided in ยง 1-206.02(c)(1); provided, that this chapter shall not take effect prior to March 31, 1981.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-119
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 45-301.
